alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Geauga, central Cuyahoga, Lake and northern Ashtabula Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 929 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles north of Conneaut to near Lakewood. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry and Timberlake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake
